sentences.sentence: There are few buildings where a photo-ID is not required for access, notes Steve Malanga of the Manhattan Institute, a think-tank.
sentences.translation: 作为智囊团的曼哈顿研究所的史蒂夫·马伦格(Steve Malanga)注意到，还是有几幢楼不需要有照片的身份证就可进入。

sentences.sentence: Steve Malanga of the conservative Manhattan Institute notes that Newark has deep social problems: over 60% of children are in homes without fathers.
sentences.translation: 保守的曼哈顿学院教授史蒂夫•马兰格（Steve Malanga）指出纽瓦克具有深层的社会问题：60%的居家儿童没有父亲；
